movie.title: Deadline
movie.description_intro: A screenwriter begins to lose the ability to distinguish between his fantasies and reality, with disastrous results. As he thinks about what this could mean, he begins to lose his grip on reality, his wife and his children begin to worry if he's become insane.
movie.description_full: A screenwriter begins to lose the ability to distinguish between his fantasies and reality, with disastrous results. As he thinks about what this could mean, he begins to lose his grip on reality, his wife and his children begin to worry if he's become insane.

movies.title: Fools' Parade
movies.summary: When a trio of ex-convicts led by Mattie Appleyard is released from prison, they hope to open a general store using money Mattie has saved during his 40-year sentence. This attempt is met with great resistance from a corrupt prison official and the banker who issued Mattie the check.
movies.description_full: When a trio of ex-convicts led by Mattie Appleyard is released from prison, they hope to open a general store using money Mattie has saved during his 40-year sentence. This attempt is met with great resistance from a corrupt prison official and the banker who issued Mattie the check.

movies.title: Jue zhan shi shen
movies.summary: A Cantonese street cook and his chief rival, a French-trained Michelin-starred chef, discover they have a lot in common as they prepare for a world-famous culinary competition. An international culinary competition becomes a battleground between rival cooks, one famous for his Cantonese street food and the other a Michelin-starred chef trained in France. But their rivalry takes an unexpected turn when they discover a common foe and combine their skills in a fusion of East and West.
movies.description_full: A Cantonese street cook and his chief rival, a French-trained Michelin-starred chef, discover they have a lot in common as they prepare for a world-famous culinary competition. But their rivalry takes an unexpected turn when they discover a common foe and combine their skills in a fusion of East and West.

movies.title: Bring Me the Head of Alfredo Garcia
movies.title_english: Bring Me the Head of Alfredo Garcia
movies.title_long: Bring Me the Head of Alfredo Garcia (1974)
movies.summary: In Mexico, the wealthy father of a pregnant young woman offers $1million for the head of the man who impregnated her. A pair of bounty hunters meet a local piano man in their search. The piano player does a little investigating, and finds out that his girlfriend knows of Garcia's death and where his body is. Thinking he can make easy money, they set off on this goal, but instead, the trip brings untold misery.
movies.description_full: In Mexico, the wealthy father of a pregnant young woman offers $1million for the head of the man who impregnated her. movies.title: Night Falls on Manhattan
movies.summary: Sean Casey is the newest member of the District Attorney's office and he is close to uncovering a police scandal that might involve his father Liam, who works for the N.Y.P.D. Then his father is critically wounded in a stake-out, Sean is chosen to prosecute the case.
